module.name: sceewlog
module.author: Swiss Seismological Service
module.description: Logs EEW magnitude messages via file, email, ActiveMQ and FCM.

parameter.name: magTypes
parameter.description: The list of magnitude types handled by sceewlog

parameter.name: generateReportTimeout
parameter.description: Timeout after which a report is generated. The timer is started on magnitude reception and restarted whenerver a new magnitude is received for the same event.

parameter.name: CitiesFile
parameter.description: CSV file that contains the location of cities. It is mandatory when changeHeadline or FCM is true.

parameter.name: EEW.comment
parameter.description: Save a comment for each EEW alert sent out through ActiveMQ or FCM. The comment is part of the Magnitude object and stored on the Comment table of the SC-DB.

parameter.name: activate
parameter.description: Send email notifications.

parameter.name: smtpserver
parameter.description: URL of the smtp server to send the report files to.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: Port where the SMTP server accepts connections.

parameter.name: usetls
parameter.description: Whether to use TLS when connecting to the smtp server.

parameter.name: usessl
parameter.description: Whether to use SSL when connecting to the smtp server. Note, only 'email.usetls' or 'user.ssl' can be true.

parameter.name: authenticate
parameter.description: Whether the smtp server requires authentication (username + password).

parameter.name: credentials
parameter.description:
If the smtp server requires authentication you have to specify a file that contains username and password in the format:
username=your-username
password=your-password
Make sure that you set the file permission as restrictive as possible.

parameter.name: senderaddress
parameter.description: Email address that will appear as sender in the report email.

parameter.name: subject
parameter.description: Any string that should be prepended to the email's subject string.

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: Host as it is supposed to appear in the email's subject string.

parameter.name: recipients
parameter.description: A list of email addresses that receive the report emails.

parameter.name: magThresh
parameter.description: Only send a notification email if the magnitude threshold is exceeded.

parameter.name: activate
parameter.description: Save reports to disk.

parameter.name: eventbuffer
parameter.description: Time in seconds that events and the related objects are buffered.

parameter.name: directory
parameter.description: Directory to save reports to.

parameter.name: activate
parameter.description: Send Alerts through ActiveMQ msg broker.

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.description: Server name that runs the ActiveMQ broker.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: Port on which ActiveMQ broker accepts stomp messages.

parameter.name: username
parameter.description: Username with which messages are sent.

parameter.name: password
parameter.description: Password with which messages are sent.

parameter.name: topic
parameter.description: ActiveMQ broker topic to send alerts to.

parameter.name: hbtopic
parameter.description: ActiveMQ broker topic to send heart beats to.

parameter.name: messageFormat
parameter.description: ActiveMQ message format; can be either 'cap1.2', 'qml1.2-rt', 'shakealert', or 'sc3ml'.

parameter.name: profiles
parameter.description: Profile names for regionalized alert filter. Use comma for more than one profile.

parameter.name: bnaFile
parameter.description: Path of BNA file that contains closed polygons which is used for regionalized filters.

group.name: profile
group.description: Profiles containing the profile-specific alert filtering parameters.

parameter.name: magThresh
parameter.description: Magnitude threshold; can be any float value.

parameter.name: likelihoodThresh
parameter.description: Likelihood threshold; can be between 0.0 to 1.0.

parameter.name: minDepth
parameter.description: Minimum depth value; can be any float value but less than maxDepth.

parameter.name: maxDepth
parameter.description: Maximum depth value; can be any float value but greater than minDepth.

parameter.name: bnaPolygonName
parameter.description: The polygon name must be one of the closed polygons that contains the ActiveMQ.bnaFile. If this is set to none, then the origin location will not be checked against any polygon.

parameter.name: maxTime
parameter.description: Time difference between origin time and magnitude creation time (in seconds). If this parameter is setup to -1, the time difference is not checked.

parameter.name: CAPheadlineChange
parameter.description: Change the headline in the cap1.2 XML alert.

parameter.name: AlertTextLanguage
parameter.description: Language for the string text on headline (cap1.2 XML) or FCM near location.

parameter.name: activate
parameter.description: Magnitude association and scoring. The score for each EQ update is the product of magnitude, likelihood, author and num. of arrivals.

parameter.name: priority
parameter.description: The priorities can be set as: magThresh, likelihood or authors. It can be all together or just one or two. Listed comma separated.

parameter.name: typeThresh
parameter.description: Set the minimum magnitude threshold values for each magnitude type configured in magTypes.

parameter.name: authors
parameter.description: Set the magnitude authors in a list comma separated. This should be generally the app name followed by the hostname.

parameter.name: stationMagNumber
parameter.description: Set the minimum number of stations on which magnitude was quantified for every magnitude type.

parameter.name: activate
parameter.description: Enable or disable FCM for using the eews2fcm interface.

parameter.name: dataFile
parameter.description: The datafile must contain the authorization key and topic to send out a message preformated on the eews2fcm interface.
